item.title: Airdopes Genesis
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Start your journey of a truly immersive wireless experience with Airdopes Genesis. Featuring a playback of 54 hours and ASAP™ Charge it gets you a never-ending immersive experience with boAt Signature sound coming from its powerful 13mm drivers. With seamless in-ear detection and quad mics with ENx™ Technology, get flawless clear calling whether it's a work call or personal chit-chat. Made with a pocketable design and premium metal finish, now witness supreme sound meet phenomenal design.
item.content:encoded: Start your journey of a truly immersive wireless experience with Airdopes Genesis. Featuring a playback of 54 hours and ASAP Charge it gets you a never-ending immersive experience with boAt Signature sound coming from its powerful 13mm drivers. With seamless in-ear detection and quad mics with ENx Technology, get flawless clear calling whether it’s a work call or personal chit-chat. Made with a pocketable design and premium metal finish, now witness supreme sound meet phenomenal design.
